Fei Laini can join Chelsea is not known

In this case, Chelsea owner Roman Abramovich ready to spend money like water this summer, buy a top midfielder to strengthen squad. According to a report in the mirror, Fei Laini became Chelsea's goal from Everton and Abramovich is willing to pay a 22 million pound transfer fee for him.

In 2008, after a move to Everton, comprehensive Fei Laini quickly became the absolute main toffee midfielder. Big Fei Laini header not only outstanding effort and foot technology favourably. By virtue of excellent play for Everton, Air Max 2010 for sale he has attracted many European giants, including Chelsea ball attention. Despite Everton hoping to retain their absolute mainstay, but according to a report in the mirror, quotations of more than 20 million pounds will be Everton could not refuse. While the tit, Chelsea and Everton, another midfielder luodeweier.

Fei Laini can join Chelsea is not known, but the blues new aid marlin has begun for his new owners advice. According to Marin said di Ma-AO is a significant cause of him joining Chelsea, in his view, di Matt should continue to serve cheap nike shox shoes as coach of the blue army.Marin said in an interview with the kicker: "join Chelsea is ideal for me, otherwise I would not seek the transfer. I have had a good conversation and di Matt, I want him to stay. ”Marin in the Bremen team-mate cheap Air Max 90 Claudio Pizarro had spent a period at Chelsea is not a good time, but Marlin was not worried that history will repeat itself: "I have done surveys (through talking with Pizarro), but I was not afraid. For me, this is a perfect step. ”

Marlin had to follow Germany teams participated in the 2008 European Championship and the 2010 World Cup, but his injury appeared more on the Bremen this year on the bench, but he also might be absent from this year's European Cup.
Hodgson is about to become the next head coach of England, di Matt is highly experienced senior commander in Chief, "he and Jamie Redknapp is both very good candidates, coaching the England team is not easy for anyone. Hodgson is a gentleman, he is a very good coach, his team has the required experience. He was in Switzerland, and Italy, England and worked each State respect him. He is very nice, went to the very popular everywhere. Roy's far better than I experienced, he is creating such an excellent team West Bromwich. ”
Mata is the largest discovered Chelsea this season, joined the blue army last summer he has contributed 12 goals and 24 assists since Cole and Robben after the leave, Mata gave Chelsea into the long lost technique of flow elements. Sometimes the Blues is too dependent on him and let him feel the pressure douzeng and compatriot Torres will support him at this time, The Gold-Children are also important reasons why he made the transfer decision. "He responded to my help difficult to describe in words. He was one of the main reasons I joined Chelsea, "Mata said. "Join me before and he spoke, he said I was stable at Chelsea, would like the League of England, so I joined. After I transfer all the help he gave me, introduce me to other people, lend me your car at any time will let me live in his home. ”

Manchester City now finally stabbed breaking Windows in this

Under the leadership of Sir Alex Ferguson, Manchester United were Premiership team with the most number of WINS in 20 years, city has been for a long time been the Red Devils stepped on foot. We are ready to win, we need not be concerned about Manchester United, Sale Nike Air Force 1 Grey we focus on our own. Primary team we beat them. ”

Silva added that his remarks did not diminish with the sworn enemies of the city means &amp;amp;quot;don't get me wrong, I mean, Manchester United is a great club, a fantastic team. They have won the League for a long time, but as I have just said, our team defeated them, now home to beat them. ”

Silva said is true, even in 2008 consortium of Abu Dhabi after the acquisition of Manchester City, when Manchester City Manchester United in the face of increased strength is still making afraid. 2009 Manchester United with Owen gunnin 'Nike Air Force 1 Supreme Phoenix Suns won 4-3, the game is fully reflects the spirit of the city in the level does not equate United with the seasoned.
